dictionary.name: _code
dictionary.string: "vec4 fragmentColor = tex(TEXTURE, UV) * 0.18;&#000a;uniform vec2 directionalTexelStep = vec2(1, 1);&#000a;&#000a;fragmentColor += tex(TEXTURE, UV - directionalTexelStep) * 0.15;&#000a;fragmentColor += tex(TEXTURE, UV - 2 * directionalTexelStep) * 0.12;&#000a;fragmentColor += tex(TEXTURE, UV - 3 * directionalTexelStep) * 0.09;&#000a;fragmentColor += tex(TEXTURE, UV - 4 * directionalTexelStep) * 0.05;&#000a;fragmentColor += tex(TEXTURE, UV + directionalTexelStep) * 0.15;&#000a;fragmentColor += tex(TEXTURE, UV + 2 * directionalTexelStep) * 0.12;&#000a;fragmentColor += tex(TEXTURE, UV + 3 * directionalTexelStep) * 0.09;&#000a;fragmentColor += tex(TEXTURE, UV + 4 * directionalTexelStep) * 0.05;&#000a;&#000a;&#000a;COLOR = SRC_COLOR * fragmentColor;"
